Chapter I

The drug issue

The purpose of your brochure may differ from business to business. Some are designed to display services, whereas others are focused on selling an idea.

Drugs consumption in Philippines

WHO CONSUME DRUGS IN PHILIPPINES ?

USE OF DRUGS CONSEQUENCES

ON PEOPLE

It’s really quickly to become addicted using drugs. People addicted don’t work and became dangerous (physically violent). They steal to buy drugs or commit crime.

A big proportion of the crime is committed by individuals who are trying to satisfy their drug habit.

ON GOVERNMENT

The government needs to spend large amounts of money on tackling drug problems.

According to the president Duterte, if nothing changes, the country can become a narco-state.

REASONS OF HIGH RATE OF DRUGS’ CONSUMPTION

MONEY
GEOGRAPHIC
PRODUCTION
SYNDICATE
PEOPLE
